name: Peppermint Marshmallows
description:
Hello! This is a fangame made for Peaches as part of the Fire Emblem Fates and Awakening Secret Santa! This is my first official game and I had so much fun making it! I hope you enjoy the game!

All in all, I believe the game will take 10 minutes to play, and there are slight story differences depending on gender.

If you see any bugs, please let me know and I'll fix them!
